thread.title: Weekend strike by Stansted security workers
thread.title_full: Weekend strike by Stansted security workers | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Weekend strike by Stansted security workers
text:
Stansted airport. Credit: ITV Anglia Staff at Stansted Airport who operate security scanners for checked in luggage are taking strike action from today until tomorrow.
Around 30 employees are expected to walk out from 3.45am this afternoon. They will resume working at 1.45pm, Sunday.
It is in relation to a dispute with their employers and private contractor Mitie, regarding pay.
Members of the GMB Union agreed to strike with a majority of 87 per cent in a vote where 80 per cent of members turned out.
They also took strike action in August and September.
Last updated Sat 10 Oct 2015 Travel Essex
